description: This file defines UI components for a React-based frontend, including Button, Input, Textarea, Card, Separator, and EmptyState components, each styled with Tailwind CSS classes.

methods.name: Button
methods.description: A customizable button component with variants for primary, secondary, and ghost styles.

methods.name: Input
methods.description: A styled input component for form inputs.

methods.name: Textarea
methods.description: A styled textarea component for multi-line text input.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: A styled container component resembling a card layout.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: A component to display empty state messages, optionally with actions.
